title: Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement: TA Intervention Strategies for Learner Support in MOOC Forums

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in MOOC Operations or Basic Understanding of Online Education Platforms
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can categorize and explain three or more TA intervention strategies based on question types occurring in MOOC forums.
Learners can design and apply five or more open-ended questions that promote collaboration among peers.
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of TA interventions using forum analysis tools (linguistic/social network analysis).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
